18#include "AZReader.h"
19#include "AZDetector.h"
20#include "AZDetectorResult.h"
21#include "AZDecoder.h"
22
23#include <memory>
24#include <utility>
25#include <vector>
26#include "Result.h"
27#include "BinaryBitmap.h"
28#include "DecoderResult.h"
29
30namespace ZXing {
31namespace Aztec {
32
33Result
34Reader::decode(const BinaryBitmap& image) const
35{
36 auto binImg = image.getBlackMatrix();
37 if (binImg == nullptr) {
38 return Result(DecodeStatus::NotFound);
39 }
40
41 DetectorResult detectResult = Detector::Detect(*binImg, false);
42 DecoderResult decodeResult = DecodeStatus::NotFound;
43 if (detectResult.isValid()) {
44 decodeResult = Decoder::Decode(detectResult);
45 }
46
47 //TODO: don't start detection all over again, just to swap 2 corner points
48 if (!decodeResult.isValid()) {
49 detectResult = Detector::Detect(*binImg, true);
50 if (detectResult.isValid()) {
51 decodeResult = Decoder::Decode(detectResult);
52 }
53 }
54
55 return Result(std::move(decodeResult), std::move(detectResult).position(), BarcodeFormat::AZTEC);
56}
57
58} // Aztec
59} // ZXing
60
